TypeSignature.Value: public delegate TOutput Converter<in TInput,out TOutput>(TInput input);
.class public auto ansi sealed Converter`2<- TInput, + TOutput> extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function Converter(Of In TInput, Out TOutput)(input As TInput) As TOutput
generic <typename TInput, typename TOutput> public delegate TOutput Converter(TInput input);

span.span: The type of object that is to be converted.

typeparam.name: TOutput
typeparam.span: 要将输入对象转换到的类型。

span.span: The type the input object is to be converted to.

summary.span: 表示将对象从一种类型转换为另一种类型的方法。

span.span: Represents a method that converts an object from one type to another type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此委托由 类的 方法和 类的 方法用于将集合中的每个元素从一种类型转换为另一种类型。This delegate is used by the method of the class and the method of the class to convert each element of the collection from one type to another. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个示例演示了 委托与 类的 方法，第二个示例演示了具有 泛型类的 方法的委托。The first demonstrates the delegate with the method of the class, and the second demonstrates the delegate with the method of the generic class. 示例 1Example 1 下面的代码示例定义了一个名为 `PointFToPoint` 的方法，该方法将 结构转换为 结构。The following code example defines a method named `PointFToPoint` that converts a structure to a structure. 然后，该示例创建一个 结构的数组，创建一个 `Converter` 委托（在 Visual Basic 中为`Converter(Of PointF, Point)`）以表示 `PointFToPoint` 方法，并将该委托传递给 方法。The example then creates an array of structures, creates a `Converter` delegate (`Converter(Of PointF, Point)` in Visual Basic) to represent the `PointFToPoint` method, and passes the delegate to the method. 方法将输入列表的每个元素传递到 `PointFToPoint` 方法，并将转换后的元素放入 结构的新列表中。The method passes each element of the input list to the `PointFToPoint` method and puts the converted elements into a new list of structures. 将显示这两个列表。Both lists are displayed. [!code-cpp[Array_ConvertAll#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_ConvertAll/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Array_ConvertAll#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_ConvertAll/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Array_ConvertAll#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_ConvertAll/vb/source.vb#1)] 示例 2Example 2 下面的代码示例定义了一个名为 `PointFToPoint` 的方法，该方法将 结构转换为 结构。The following code example defines a method named `PointFToPoint` that converts a structure to a structure. 然后，该示例创建一个 的 结构，在 Visual Basic 中创建一个 `Converter\``Converter(Of PointF, Point)` 委托来表示 `PointFToPoint` 方法，并将该委托传递给 方法。The example then creates a of structures, creates a `Converter\` delegate (`Converter(Of PointF, Point)` in Visual Basic) to represent the `PointFToPoint` method, and passes the delegate to the method. 方法将输入列表的每个元素传递到 `PointFToPoint` 方法，并将转换后的元素放入 结构的新列表中。The method passes each element of the input list to the `PointFToPoint` method and puts the converted elements into a new list of structures. 将显示这两个列表。Both lists are displayed. [!code-cpp[List\`1_ConvertAll#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/List`1_ConvertAll/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[List\`1_ConvertAll#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/List`1_ConvertAll/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[List\`1_ConvertAll#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/List`1_ConvertAll/vb/source.vb#1)]
